title: "AI's Growing Influence: Over 7,000 Mentions In Q2 Earnings Calls Boost Stocks"
excerpt: "AI-related terms saw record mentions during the second-quarter earnings season, at a total of 7,358 between all companies in the S&P 500. That's 4.6 more times than the previous quarter and 3.3 more times than in the fourth quarter of 2022."
